panels.description: % de requisições com erro por endpoint
panels.title: % Error Rate

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  SpanAttributes['exception.type'] AS "Exception Type",
  SpanName AS "Route",
  count() AS "Total"
FROM default.otel_traces
WHERE
  has(SpanAttributes, 'exception.type')
GROUP BY
  "Exception Type", "Route"
targets.rawQuery:
/* grafana dashboard='System Observability', user='0' */
SELECT
  SpanAttributes['exception.type'] AS "Exception Type",
  SpanName AS "Route",
  count() AS "Total"
FROM default.otel_traces
WHERE
  has(SpanAttributes, 'exception.type')
GROUP BY
  "Exception Type", "Route"
